original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2266)@</color>凝煉出12朵火焰蓮花，，隨機追擊敵人，並對目標以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2266)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2266)@</color> condensed 12 flame lotus flowers, chased enemies randomly, and used <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2266)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> causes spell damage to the enemy.
